title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Teaches the value of deep, focused work and how it can help you achieve peak performance.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones using proven scientific strategies.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A spiritual guide to help you discover your true self by living fully in the present moment.

title: Start With Why
author: Simon Sinek
description: A powerful book about how great leaders inspire action by starting with why they do what they do.

title: Can’t Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
description: Navy SEAL David Goggins shares his life story and teaches mental toughness and discipline.

title: Ikigai
author: Héctor García and Francesc Miralles
description: Explores the Japanese concept of Ikigai—your reason for being—and how it leads to a long and happy life.
